Responsible for driving tactical and strategic operations of the professional services team for Media and Carrier accounts.

Part of the Customer Solution Group (CSG) leadership team whose time is roughly divided between leading a distributed team of Professional Services Consultants to ensure quality of service delivery to the customers and the operational effectiveness of the team. The remainder with customers on strategic pre- and post-sales initiatives.Responsibilities:Leadership- Managing a team of distributed members located in 3 regional sales offices. This includes Engagement Managers (EMs), Technical Project managers (TPMs).-Provide performance coaching and feedback, technical leadership and mentoring to team members.- Partner with Regional Sales Manager(s) and peer Service Line leaders to monitor account health and perform 100% service fulfillment.- Participate in Professional Services management team meetings, representing assigned regions and division.- Perform annual performance reviews for individual team members.- Own resource planning and resource assignment for assigned sales regions.- Track, report and improve team metrics.- Ensure the global best practices of the Professional Services teams are adhered to-Focus on team development and market research on products in the spaceCustomer-Facing- Provide technical and architectural expertise in positioning and integrating products and services within a customer’s environment.- Build customer relationships by analyzing technology trends, gathering business requirements, and developing and designing solutions.- Interact with sales team, pre-sales team and the customer during the pre-sales cycle to provide implementation scope and estimates, and create proposals, 1-3 year Account(s) Strategy and Statements of Work.- Work closely with Sales, Presales, Service Delivery, Engineering, Data Science, Product Development and Customer Care to resolve issues that arise during integrations & post go-live ongoing maintenance.

Engagement Managers at Akamai utilize their background in technical consultancy, project management & delivery to design and implement technical strategies that align with their Customer's online strategies. They invest time in understanding Akamai, the Customers' industries, business models and technologies to ascertain the best route to long term development and a strong, innovative relationship between Akamai and the Customer.Responsibilities:- Partnering and supporting the very large & strategic class of Akamai customers - Working independently or leading virtual teams to create a strategy, to evaluate the Customer's web architecture, to deliver and support the appropriate technical solutions and roadmap. Continue the education of Customers about the superiority of Akamai's services - this includes conference calls, site visits, presentations, technical evaluations & reviews, technical objection handling, proposals, and follow up on all customer related technical issues.- Utilize strong industry and technical expertise to provide consultancy and strategic development of our Customers' online goals.- Pursue all avenues - formal and innovative - to defend against competition, protect revenue from churn and proactively prove the value of both Akamai's vastly experience Service & Support and The Akamai Intelligent Platform™.- Serve as an escalation point for the Customers' Service & Support Agreement and manage executive level client relationships. Collaborate across Service, Support, Sales, Product Development and Engineering to both resolve issues and solve Customer requirements.- Establish strong working relationships with Customers and drive growth by solution adoption, product mix and long term strategic alignment to The Akamai Intelligent Platform™ and product portfolio.- Drive excellent Customer Satisfaction by understanding and over-delivering against Customer expectations.

* Work independently or lead small technical teams with Akamai enterprise customers to evaluate their web architecture and deliver the appropriate integration solution. This includes, but is not limited to, evaluating the customers’ content management and publishing processes, web application architecture, security requirements, DNS configurations, and provide detailed documentation for a custom solution that satisfies the customers’ business and technical requirements.*  Work closely with customers and pre-sales teams to manage and implement customer trials, propose technically feasible solutions and set accurate expectations on effort and timelines for integration. Establish success criteria and act as the single point of contact for the customer for all technical issues and project deliverables.* Create and manage to proposals, Statements of Work and detailed project plans for customer integrations including timelines and effort estimates.* Work closely with Account Management, Sales professionals, engineering, product development and Customer Care to resolve issues that arise during customer trials or integrations.* Identify new product features and additional sales opportunities during trials and integrations and communication of the same to product development and sales teams.* Track and document status and time spent on customer integrations.* Participate in internal projects that help scale the group, implement best practices, and improving our methodology and quality of integrations.* Review quality of customer integrations.* Support and train technical team of Partner organizations.
Managing mutiple maintenance and development projects parallely. Scrum master, risk management, infrastructure deployment management,crisis management, problem solving and technical management.
